Zachariah or Zacharias__04.1: And the angel that spoke in me came again: and he waked me, as a man that is wakened out of his sleep.
Zachariah or Zacharias__04.2: And he said to me: What seest thou? And I said: I have looked, and behold <u>a candlestick</u> all of gold, and its lamp upon the top of it: and the seven lights thereof upon it: and seven funnels for the lights that were upon the top thereof.
Zachariah or Zacharias__04.3: And two olive trees over it: one upon the right side of the lamp, and the other upon the left side thereof.
Zachariah or Zacharias__04.4: And I answered, and said to the angel that spoke in me, saying: What are these things, my lord?
Zachariah or Zacharias__04.5: And the angel that spoke in me answered, and said to me: Knowest thou not what these things are? And I said: No, my lord.
Zachariah or Zacharias__04.6: And he answered, and spoke to me, saying: This is the word of the Lord <u>to Zorobabel</u>, saying: Not with an army, nor by might, but by my spirit, saith the Lord of hosts.
Zachariah or Zacharias__04.7: Who art thou, O <u>great mountain</u>, before Zorobabel? thou shalt become a plain: and he shall bring out the chief stone, and <u>shall give equal grace</u> to the grace thereof.
Zachariah or Zacharias__04.8: And the word of the Lord came to me, saying:
Zachariah or Zacharias__04.9: The hands of Zorobabel have laid the foundations of this house, and his hands shall finish it: and you shall know that the Lord of hosts hath sent me to you.
Zachariah or Zacharias__04.10: For who hath despised <u>little days</u>? and they shall rejoice, and shall see <u>the tin plummet</u> in the hand of Zorobabel. These are <u>the seven eyes</u> of the Lord, that run to and fro through the whole earth.
Zachariah or Zacharias__04.11: And I answered, and said to him: What are these two olive trees upon the right side of the candlestick, and upon the left side thereof?
Zachariah or Zacharias__04.12: And I answered again, and said to him: What are the two olive branches, that are by the two golden beaks, in which are the funnels of gold?
Zachariah or Zacharias__04.13: And he spoke to me, saying: Knowest thou not what these are? And I said: No, my lord.
Zachariah or Zacharias__04.14: And he said: These are <u>two sons of oil</u> who stand before the Lord of the whole earth.
